roleset.name: to branch out
roleset.note: DIVERGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'diverge' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from diverge.01-v predicate notes)
DIVERGENCE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls differ-23.4. (from divergence.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: That 's where the two scripts would diverge [*T*-1] .

example.name: arg1
example.text: If we judge from the divergence of this point , Russia has a lot more room to maneuver in many international affairs than China does .

example.name: both args
example.text: Wave number processing techniques to determine structural intensity and its divergence from optical measurements without leakage effects.
